name: liverebel
long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Downloads and installs LiveRebel from liverebel.com website. It will install the software to /opt/liverebel-version. This version does not support auto starting LiveRebel.

= REQUIREMENTS:

Depends on the availability of the unzip command.

= ATTRIBUTES:

= USAGE:
description: Downloads and installs LiveRebel from liverebel.com website.
